name: class-action-mcp-node
description: Class Action Settlement Finder - Helps users discover and check eligibility for active and expired class action lawsuits and settlements. Covers data breaches, privacy violations, consumer rights, healthcare billing, financial services, false advertising, and other legal settlements where users may be entitled to compensation. Provides settlement details including payout amounts, deadlines, eligibility criteria, and claim filing links. Supports filtering by category (Technology, Healthcare, Financial, Consumer, Retail), location, and age range.
